rules_text:
Trample
Barghest must block attacking creatures with less power than hers.
Whenever a creature with less power than Barghest dies create a 1/1 Red Dog token creature.
At the beginning of your end step if no creatures died since your last turn put a +1/+1 counter on Barghest, then if she has 5 or more +1/+1 counters place +1/+1 counters equal to her power on her and she loses this ability.
